ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

GlobalReference.description: The global reference to this user.

ManagedBy.description: The branch linked to this user

ApplicationStaffModel.description: Holds the information about a member of staff.

Count.description: The total number of results available for all pages

Data.description: The resulting data returned from the paged query range

ApplicationStaffModelResults.description: Holds results from a paged query returning ApplicationStaffModel values

Branch.description: The branch that manages this area.

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

AreaModel.description: Stores the information about a single property area.

Count.description: The total number of results available for all pages

Data.description: The resulting data returned from the paged query range

AreaModelResults.description: Holds results from a paged query returning AreaModel values

CompanyName.description: The relevant company name, if not the one specified on the branch then the one on company.

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

BranchModel.description: Defines a single branch of a client.

Count.description: The total number of results available for all pages

Data.description: The resulting data returned from the paged query range

BranchModelResults.description: Holds results from a paged query returning BranchModel values

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

ShortName.description: The unique identifier assigned to the client

CompanyModel.description: The search code for the ApplicationCompany storage object.

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

End.description: The end date/time of this allocation.

Staff.description: The staff member holding this allocation.

Start.description: The start date/time of this allocation.

DiaryAllocationModel.description:
Represents a single diary allocation, capable of holding a number
            of appointments associated with a member of staff.

Cancelled.description: Whether the appointment has been cancelled.

CreatedAt.description: The date/time this appointment was created.

CreatedBy.description: The staff member that created this appointment.

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

End.description: The end date/time of this appointment.

RemindAt.description: The date/time to remind the staff member of this appointment.

RemindBefore.description: The number of minutes before the appointment start date/time to remind the staff member. -1 means don't remind.

Staff.description: The staff member holding this appointment.

Start.description: The start date/time of this appointment.

DiaryAppointmentModel.description: Represents a single diary appointment for a staff member.

InventoryItem.description: The inventory item the photo is assigned to (if applicable).

Property.description: The property the photo is assigned to.

Room.description: The room the photo is assigned to. (If applicable)

Description.description: The block, property or room description.

Address1.description: Address 1 of the property to be sold

Address2.description: Address 2 of the property to be sold

Address3.description: Address 3 of the property to be sold

Address4.description: Address 4 of the property to be sold

AddressNumber.description: Address number of the property to be sold

Area.description: The area linked to the instruction

Bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms linked to the instruction

BathroomsEnsuite.description: How many of the bathrooms are ensuite?

Bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms linked to the instruction

Country.description: Address country of the property to be sold

DevelopmentOpp.description: Is the instruction a development opportunity?

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

HasElectricitySupply.description: Does the instruction have an electrical supply linked to it?

HasGasSupply.description: Does the instruction have an gas supply linked to it?

HasWaterMeter.description: Does the instruction have a water meter linked to it?

InvestmentOpp.description: Is the instruction a investment opportunity?

Kitchens.description: Number of kitchens linked to the property instruction

OutsideSpaceBalcony.description: Does the instruction have an outside balcony linked to it?

OutsideSpaceCommunalGarden.description: Does the instruction have a communal garden linked to it?

OutsideSpaceConservatory.description: Does the instruction have a conservatory linked to it?

OutsideSpaceGarden.description: Does the instruction have a garden linked to it?

OutsideSpaceLargeGarden.description: Does the instruction have a large garden linked to it?

OutsideSpacePatio.description: Does the instruction have a patio linked to it?

OutsideSpaceRoofTerrace.description: Does the instruction have a roof terrace linked to it?

OutsideSpaceSouthFacingGarden.description: Does the instruction have a south facing garden?

ParkingAllocated.description: Is there any parking allocation linked to the instruction?

ParkingCarport.description: Does the instruction have a carport linked to it?

ParkingDoubleGarage.description: Does the instruction have a double garage linked to it?

ParkingGarage.description: Does the instruction have a garage linked to it?

ParkingOffRoad.description: Is there off road parking linked to the instruction?

ParkingOnRoad.description: Is there on road parking linked to the instruction?

ParkingSecureGated.description: Is there any secured gate parking linked to the instruction?

ParkingTripleGarage.description: Does the instruction have a triple garage linked to it?

Postcode.description: Postcode of the property to be sold

Price.description: The price of the property to be sold

ReceptionRooms.description: Number of reception rooms linked to the instruction

VideoURL.description: The URL of the video linked to the Sales Instruction

Count.description: The total number of results available for all pages

Data.description: The resulting data returned from the paged query range

SalesInstructionModelResults.description: Holds results from a paged query returning SalesInstructionModel values

AdvertiseFrom.description: The date to advertise this tenancy from.

Branch.description: The branch the tenancy is assigned to..

ETag.description: A unique identifier defining the object and change revision.

GlobalReference.description: The global reference for a tenancy.

IsShareProperty.description: Is this property a shared property.

IsStudentProperty.description: Is this property a student property.

IsTenancyAdvertised.description:
Gets a value indicating whether this tenancy is being advertised. Note
            that this will only return true while the tenancy has a valid advertise
            date. It will not return true in the proposed phase.

IsTenancyProposed.description: Is the tenancy a proposed tenancy?

MaximumTenants.description: The maximum number of tenants to advertise for.

MinimumTenants.description: The minimum number of tenants to advertise for.

RentAdvertised.description: The advertised amount of rent for the property.

TenancyProperty.description: The property linked to this tenancy.

TenantSystemTypes.description: The specific tenant type list, or empty if for all types.

UtilityCouncilTax.description: Who's responsible for council tax bills.

TenancyModel.description:
Represents a single tenancy on a property structure. This class may
            be considered to be the context of the tenancy strategy pattern. The
            strategy is the tenancy service, that dictates the algorithm applied
            to the tenancy. This class therefore holds the raw data of a tenancy,
            and ignores any tenancy service (fully managed, let only) parameters.

Count.description: The total number of results available for all pages

Data.description: The resulting data returned from the paged query range

TenancyModelResults.description: Holds results from a paged query returning TenancyModel values
